overview: Comedy - When he takes a job in a hospital working under an uncle he holds in high esteem, a young physician comes face to face with illegal activity that makes him question everything -- including his uncle's integrity. All the while, a female social worker is falling for the doctor, but he's blind to her affections. Bharat Jadhav, Vinay Yedekar and Surekha Kudachi head the cast of this rib-tickling comedy directed by Vijay Gokhale (who also stars). -  Ramesh Bhatkar, Vijay Chavan, Vijay Gokhale
title: Bharat Aala Parat
